title: Tata Motors to build â‚¹9,000-crore plant in Tamil Nadu
description: Stalin and senior executives of Tata Motors were present in Chennai for the signing of the MoU. It will be Tata Motors' second plant in southern India, after Dharwad in Karnataka, and marks the second big-ticket automobile investment in Tamil Nadu, following Vietnamese company VinFast's recent announcement.
